author: rcmatthews
msg: Specification loader now also is a DebugInfo as all main components are.

author: dkhaywood
msg: making ReflectorInstaller more consistent with PersistenceMechanismInstaller; annotatoin facet factories now search up the hierarchy (that is, annotations are inherited from interfaces) - this change introduced originally because needed for cglib/javassist, but is a useful feature in its own right; sorted out problem with AdapterManagerDefault treatment of mutable value types; application archetype now working ok I think - nb: is preconfigured for cglib...
